question:
[Carolyn] takes good care of her grandmother, [Sarah]. [Sarah] called her son, [Gregory], from upstairs so that he could eat lunch. [Gregory] got his sister, [Mary], so she could eat lunch as well. [Julie] went to her son [Dustin]'s House [Daniel] and his brother [Roger] always played pranks on each other [Carolyn] enjoys playing cards with her brother. His name is [Dustin]. [Jamie] and her sister [Mary] were baking cake. [Jamie]'s brother [Roger] came in and tried to eat some of the mix, but they told him to wait until it was finished.
Question: How is [Daniel] related to [Julie]?
